DOC.brief_summary: To review the influence of patient derived PRGF on the healing process of Achilles tendon after a surgical correction of a complete tear.
DOC.brief_title: Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP) as a Treatment for ACHILLES Tendon Tears
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous platelet-rich matrices may aid in post surgical patients by promoting and accelerating tissue healing because of the release of growth factors including transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta1 and platelet-derived growth factor (PDGF) from platelet alpha-granules.
DOC.criteria: A complete tear of Achilles tendon Age 1850 years old under 18 year of age pregnancy physical or mental disabilities
